name: Commando Mission Sniper Shoot
description:
Commando Mission Sniper Shoot:
This game is base on real story of a brave sharp shooter who was assigned duty to kill and shoot enemies in a city.it's your duty to save the people of the city that means hunting terrorists and enemies quickly so that no citizen should hurt.In This game your position is on the top of the building so that u can see the people of the city easily and make sure to kill the enemies and terrorists so they can't harm the citizen.In this game you also have save to self Of them so that they cant see you if they see you the ememies or terrorists they will immediately react and harm the citizens.All you have to do is to fight on your own in this game The enemy force you are dealing with is highly trained and Professional in this game.You should kill all the gangster enemies in given limited time with your powerful sniper rifle games.If you could not kill all criminals in given time then your level will fail. Kill your enemy before they kill you and make sure to Keep on changing position t o avoid get shot by enemies.Your mission is to kill these enemies as soon as possible they are visible to you to complete the mission.Commando Mission Sniper Shooting is a good game.You will kill the enemy with a given specific time.if you Can not kill the enemy then level will be fail.you can easily target your opponent if you have a good skills of shooting.first focus on the target and then trigger on And kill the enemy.Multiple Number of level is available.big critical with Specific time.if you can cover the all the things then you will die after your health end.Enemy continuously shoot the commando and kill him.you can really enjoy this game after plying This game.After playing this game feedback us..
